lead_paragraph: A 20-year-old man was arrested in connection with the killing of the former heavyweight champion Trevor Berbick, who was bludgeoned and left to die in a church courtyard next to his home in Jamaica on Saturday. Several residents of the remote farming community in Norwich district said the suspect, who was not identified by the police, was involved in a land dispute with Berbick.
